page.title: 18Meldrum/Bourtie church clubs
page.content: The church of Scotland Kirk Session (Church Committee) is responsible for forming a number of social clubs and classes in religious education in Oldmeldrum for the united parishes of Meldrum and Bourtie. Minister the Rev Robert Johnstone has been in the parish five years and provides the local primary school with weekly classes in Christian fellowship for all pupils. Sunday School meets every Sunday expect holidays, as do the Breakfast Club for teenagers, Quest for those aged 12 to 14, and the Sunday club for ges 12 to 15. There is an annual Church Picnic for all ages. Women's groups include the Women's Guild, the Young Women's group and the Mother and Toddler group. All have coffee mornings, jumble sales or discos throughout the year.
